title: White House revamps membership of National Space Council advisory group
summary: The White House announced the new membership of an advisory group of the National Space Council Dec. 16 with wholesale changes in the roster reflecting a new emphasis on climate change and workforce issues.

title: SpaceX to launch two missions from Florida in two days
summary: SpaceX is looking to launch a pair of Falcon 9 missions approximately 24 hours apart. The first mission carrying the first two satellites for a new constellation known as O3b mPOWER is scheduled to take flight from Space Launch Complex 40 (SLC-40) at the Cape Canaveral Space Force Station (CCSFS) at 4:21 PM EST (21:21 UTC).

title: Here’s what we know, and what we don’t, about the damaged Soyuz spacecraft
summary: The biggest concern is the flight computers on board the Soyuz spacecraft.

title: NASA's Perseverance Rover to Begin Building Martian Sample Depot
summary: The 10 sample tubes being dropped on Mars’ surface so they can be studied on Earth in the future carry an amazing diversity of Red Planet geology.

title: Space company Maxar agrees to go private in $6.4 billion deal
summary: Space imagery and infrastructure company Maxar on Friday announced an agreement to go private through an acquisition led by Advent International.
